Class SerializableBaseObject

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      uk.ac.man.jb.pct.util.SerializableBaseObject

java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Neuron, SelfOrganizingMap, SOMClassifier
public class SerializableBaseObject
extends java.lang.Thread

This class is extended by other classes that require the capability to serialize their states to XML.

Author:
Rob Lyon
